word:
A Statement for Those Who Question Mrs. White's 
                          Manner of Eating 


                                             Letter 50, 1908 
     23. It is reported by some that I have not lived up to the principles of health reform, as I have advocated them with 
                                                                           492
my pen. But I can say that so far as my knowledge goes, I have not departed from those principles. Those who have eaten at my table know that I have not placed flesh meats before them. . . .
